page.title: 15ST.MARKS CHURCH ,AMPFIELD
page.content: Leaning over the bible,is a large eagle which is carved from the same piece of wood.Instead of climbing the stairs up to the{bell tower}to ring the bells, the ropes come down through the pillars and come out into a cupboard in the wall.A set of stairs lead up to an old room where the past vicars used to change before they gave their sermons.Outsidein the{graveyard there are many graves with tombstones and in the centre grows an enormous yew tree which is about 500 years old. There are usually about 8{funerals and 6{weddings}held every year at St. Marks.The Reverend Moore runs a Sunday School called the 4th Sunday Club which is held every 4th Sunday.
